page.title: 06 ENERGY
page.content: Again we managed to interview 44 people out of a possible 66 householders. We found 44 used Electricity to light their homes and 34 used it to cook with and 23 heated their homes electrically. We do not have any Gas laid on in Sapperton but 4 use bottled gas for heating. Solid Fuel is the most popular way of getting warm using stoves and open fires. Villagers have traditional 'wooding ' rights, by which they are allowed to go out in the woods with hand carts and bring back all the dead wood they find.
